languages.text: Таинственный корабль Эксплораторов "Гекзальтация" совершил посадку на поверхность мира. Механикус любезно уведомили власти, что близлежащие мануфакторумы взяты ими под контроль для отправления обрядов обслуживания судна, а рабочие единицы, трудившиеся там, сервиторизированы. Запросив огромные объемы бесценных материалов, слуги Омниссии ни словом не обмолвились о причинах визита и деталях своей миссии, выразили благодарность за содействие и туманно посулили награду, "адекватную вкладу планетарных властей".

A mysterious Explorator ship, the Hexaltation, has landed on this world's surface. The Tech-Priests graciously informed the authorities that they had taken control of nearby manufactorums in order to perform the rites of ship maintenance, and made servitors of the worker units deployed there. The servants of the Omnissiah requested enormous quantities of priceless materials without saying a word as to the purpose of their visit or the details of their mission. They have expressed their gratitude for the assistance and vaguely promised a reward "commensurate with the planetary authorities' contribution."

The servants of the Omnissiah requested enormous quantities of priceless materials without saying a word as to the purpose of their visit or the details of their mission. They have expressed their gratitude for the assistance and vaguely promised a reward "commensurate with the planetary authorities' contribution."

A mysterious Explorator ship, the Hexaltation, has landed on this world's surface. The Tech-Priests graciously informed the authorities that they had taken control of nearby manufactorums in order to perform the rites of ship maintenance, and made servitors of the worker units deployed there. The servants of the Omnissiah requested enormous quantities of priceless materials without saying a word as to the purpose of their visit or the details of their mission. They have expressed their gratitude for the assistance and vaguely promised a reward "commensurate with the planetary authorities' contribution."

languages.text: Una misteriosa nave exploradora, la Hexaltation, ha aterrizado en la superficie del planeta. Los tecnosacerdotes han informado amablemente a las autoridades de que han tomado el control de los manufactorums cercanos para realizar los ritos de mantenimiento de la nave y convertido en servidores a los trabajadores asignados a ellos. Los sirvientes del Omnissiah solicitaron cantidades ingentes de materiales valiosísimos sin entrar en detalles sobre el propósito de su visita ni los particulares de su misión. Han expresado su agradecimiento por la ayuda y prometido una recompensa «correspondiente a la contribución de las autoridades planetarias».
languages.original_text: A mysterious Explorator ship, the Hexaltation, has landed on this world's surface. The Tech-Priests graciously informed the authorities that they had taken control of nearby manufactorums in order to perform the rites of ship maintenance, and made servitors of the worker units deployed there. The servants of the Omnissiah requested enormous quantities of priceless materials without saying a word as to the purpose of their visit or the details of their mission. They have expressed their gratitude for the assistance and vaguely promised a reward "commensurate with the planetary authorities' contribution."

traits.locale_text: Una misteriosa nave exploradora, la Hexaltation, ha aterrizado en la superficie del planeta. Los tecnosacerdotes han informado amablemente a las autoridades de que han tomado el control de los manufactorums cercanos para realizar los ritos de mantenimiento de la nave y convertido en servidores a los trabajadores asignados a ellos. Los sirvientes del Omnissiah solicitaron cantidades ingentes de materiales valiosísimos sin entrar en detalles sobre el propósito de su visita ni los particulares de su misión. Han expresado su agradecimiento por la ayuda y prometido una recompensa «correspondiente a la contribución de las autoridades planetarias».

languages.text: Un mystérieux vaisseau des Explorators, l'Hexaltation, s'est posé à la surface de ce monde. Les technoprêtres ont gracieusement informé les autorités qu'ils avaient pris le contrôle des manufactorums voisins afin de procéder aux rites d'entretien des vaisseaux, convertissant le personnel sur place en servitors. Bien que les envoyés de l'Omnimessie aient réclamé de vastes quantités de matériaux d'une valeur inestimable, ils se refusent à divulguer la raison de leur visite ou les détails de leur mission. Ils se sont contentés d'exprimer leur gratitude et ont vaguement promis une récompense « à la hauteur de la contribution des autorités planétaires ».
languages.original_text: A mysterious Explorator ship, the Hexaltation, has landed on this world's surface. The Tech-Priests graciously informed the authorities that they had taken control of nearby manufactorums in order to perform the rites of ship maintenance, and made servitors of the worker units deployed there. The servants of the Omnissiah requested enormous quantities of priceless materials without saying a word as to the purpose of their visit or the details of their mission. They have expressed their gratitude for the assistance and vaguely promised a reward "commensurate with the planetary authorities' contribution."

Les technoprêtres ont gracieusement informé les autorités qu'ils avaient pris le contrôle des manufactorums voisins afin de procéder aux rites d'entretien des vaisseaux, convertissant le personnel sur place en servitors. Ils se sont contentés d'exprimer leur gratitude et ont vaguement promis une récompense « à la hauteur de la contribution des autorités planétaires ».

languages.text: 一艘神秘的开拓者飞船“机神欣悦”号降落在行星表面。技术神甫泰然自若地通知行星政府，他们已经控制了周围的制造工厂，以便执行飞船维护仪式，并将原本部署在工厂中的劳工改造成机仆。欧姆尼塞亚的仆人索要了大量珍贵的材料，却绝口不提他们此行的目的与任务的细节。他们对行星的援助表达了谢意，并语焉不详地承诺会给予“与行星政府的善意相称的回报”。
languages.original_text: A mysterious Explorator ship, the Hexaltation, has landed on this world's surface. The Tech-Priests graciously informed the authorities that they had taken control of nearby manufactorums in order to perform the rites of ship maintenance, and made servitors of the worker units deployed there. The servants of the Omnissiah requested enormous quantities of priceless materials without saying a word as to the purpose of their visit or the details of their mission. They have expressed their gratitude for the assistance and vaguely promised a reward "commensurate with the planetary authorities' contribution."

languages.text: 謎めいた探索船、ヘクサルテイションがこの惑星の地表に着陸した。帝国技術局は、この船の整備の儀式を行うため、近隣の聖工場を掌握し、そこに配備されている労働ユニットをサーヴィターとしたことを当局へと伝えた。万機神のしもべたちは、訪問の目的や任務の詳細について一切語らず、膨大な量の貴重な資材を要求した。彼らは援助には感謝の意を表し、「惑星当局の貢献に見合った」ものという漠然とした表現で報酬を約束した。

They have expressed their gratitude for the assistance and vaguely promised a reward "commensurate with the planetary authorities' contribution."

謎めいた探索船、ヘクサルテイションがこの惑星の地表に着陸した。帝国技術局は、この船の整備の儀式を行うため、近隣の聖工場を掌握し、そこに配備されている労働ユニットをサーヴィターとしたことを当局へと伝えた。万機神のしもべたちは、訪問の目的や任務の詳細について一切語らず、膨大な量の貴重な資材を要求した。彼らは援助には感謝の意を表し、「惑星当局の貢献に見合った」ものという漠然とした表現で報酬を約束した。

languages.text: Ein mysteriöses Explorator-Schiff, die Hexaltation, ist auf der Oberfläche dieser Welt gelandet. Die Techpriester haben die Behörden freundlich informiert, dass sie die Kontrolle über Manufactorien in der Nähe übernommen haben, um die Riten der Schiffswartung durchzuführen, und dass sie die dort stationierten Arbeiter zu Servitoren gemacht haben. Die Diener des Omnissiah haben gewaltige Mengen an teuren Materialien angefordert, ohne ein Wort darüber zu verlieren, welchem Zweck ihr Besuch dient oder wie ihre Mission lautet. Sie haben ihrem Dank für die Unterstützung Ausdruck verliehen und vage eine "dem Beitrag der planetaren Behörden angemessene" Belohnung versprochen.

languages.text: Hekzaltasyon adlı esrarengiz bir Keşiftör gemisi gezegenin yüzeyine iniş yaptı. Tekno Rahipler, geminin bakımını yapabilmek için yakındaki manufaktorumlara bir süreliğine el koyduklarını ve buralarda çalışmakta olan işçi birimleri hizmetörleştirdiklerini nezaket gösterip yetkililere bildirdiler. Hermesih'in hizmetkârları, ziyaretlerinin sebebine yahut misyonlarının teferruatına dair tek kelime etmeden yüklü miktarda paha biçilmez materyaller talep etti. Gördükleri yardımlar için minnettar olduklarını belirtip "gezegen yetkililerinin katkılarına yaraşır" bir mükâfatın sözünü verdiler.
languages.original_text: A mysterious Explorator ship, the Hexaltation, has landed on this world's surface. The Tech-Priests graciously informed the authorities that they had taken control of nearby manufactorums in order to perform the rites of ship maintenance, and made servitors of the worker units deployed there. The servants of the Omnissiah requested enormous quantities of priceless materials without saying a word as to the purpose of their visit or the details of their mission. They have expressed their gratitude for the assistance and vaguely promised a reward "commensurate with the planetary authorities' contribution."
